seus bostas
1.5k hours, still in silver. Great game and a lot of content.

This game is one of the only games where you feel yourself genuinely get better as you climb throughout competitive ranks. The only real gripe I have is the trust factor MM. Trust factor matchmaking makes it so that if you have had some ban in the past or have been reported for however many times, you get matched with people who have had a similar amount of reports. This seems good on purpose, but if you get to a low trust factor, it's almost impossible to regain Papa Gaben's trust. You just get stuck in tons of games with hackers and griefers, and have to basically make a new account. Other than that, everything in Prime matchmaking is all well and good. Non-Prime btw is the free version of CS:GO, where there is many hackers, and many griefers. If you are planning on playing this game, please BUY IT. It is worth the price for Prime matchmaking.
